title: Chat wont pop up if i hit enter
body: This link was disabled and no i have no way of fixing the issue with my chat i need some help because it makes games harder to play without it.

replies.body:
A player named *vrFox* made [a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/jcaTWBxM-how-to-reset-in-game-chat-window-position-as-of-patch-615) on how to fix this a day ago. It's one method of manually resetting the window by editing your file personally. The alternative method involves clearing out all files in the Config folder as a whole while logged in.

Let me know if *vrFox*'s method worked for you and reply to their post to let them know as well.
